explanation: [0-0] A little girl reaches out and hugs a man, both standing in a courtyard. The man is wearing a yellow T-shirt and brown shorts, while the girl is wearing a vest and shorts. The man has an exaggerated expression and is looking directly at the camera, while the girl has no expression on her face.

[0-2] The girl continues to hold the man, hanging on him. The man stretches out his hands, imitating the movement of riding a motorcycle, and steps hard on the accelerator, his eyes wide open. The picture switches to a black and white kitten standing on its hind legs, making the same movement as the man in a room.

The picture switches to a black and white kitten standing on its hind legs, making the same movement as the man in a room.

[2-10] The man looks surprised at the camera, and the little girl on him smiles. The picture briefly cuts back to the black and white kitten, who continues to make the movement and dances. The picture cuts back to the man, who also does the same dance as the kitten, grinning at the camera.
